idea-plugin.name: Niddler
idea-plugin.description: This plugin enables the niddler ui inside the IDE
idea-plugin.change-notes: 0.0.16 - Fixed exception when the server uses a different format. Support for exporting to HAR 1.2 0.0.15 - Better handle empty bodies (from network requests/replies) 0.0.14 - Support for actual network requests 0.0.13 - Experimental export for exporting to curl. Highlight row when right-clicking cell 0.0.12 - Fixed non-themed UI in detauls and reworked details UI 0.0.11 - Support copy of message detail values and header names 0.0.10 - Support for linked mode (alpha) 0.0.9 - Remove required dependency on adb
